snippet: Kioi Sinfonietta Tokyo celebrated the centennial of Japan’s gift of cherry blossom trees to America on Wednesday evening with a program of Mozart and Beethoven at Alice Tully Hall.
abstract: Vivien Schweitzer reviews performance by the Japanese orchestra Kioi Sinfonietta Tokyo at Alice Tully Hall.
lead_paragraph: Kioi Sinfonietta Tokyo celebrated the centennial of Japan’s gift of cherry blossom trees to America on Wednesday evening with a program of Mozart and Beethoven at Alice Tully Hall.
